resources.string: This App is developed for motivational purposes only. All Cars Images in this app are collected from Internet and credits goes to their respective owners. We are not the owners of these images. We only created quotes on that.

Billionaire Dreams is free android application with collection of daily updating motivational quotes. Everyone needs motivation and encouragement in life. Our collection includes best motivational quotes with high quality images which will inspire and motivate you to achieve your goal. Share your favourite motivational quotes on social media. Change your dp and status to motivate your friends.
